docs.snippet: The Board of Aldermen met last evening, Presient CLANCY in the chair. A communication was received from the Mayor in relation to certain water grants on the North River, between Hammond and Thirtieth streets.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Board of Aldermen. Board of Councilmnen. SONS OF TEMPERANCE. THE FIGHT FOR THE CHAMPIONSHIP. Police Intelligence. BELLIGERENT ROWDIES ON A SPREE. TICKET SWINDLING. Sabbuth Disturbances Up Town.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Aldermen met last evening, Presient CLANCY in the chair. A communication was received from the Mayor in relation to certain water grants on the North River, between Hammond and Thirtieth streets.
